title: Plan Animal Guard Installation Program
description: After analyzing outage data, an asset manager decides to proactively install animal guards on transformers in areas with high rates of animal-caused outages.

tasks.description: Analyze historical outage data to identify circuits with the highest frequency of 'animal contact' cause codes.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of the top 20 worst-performing circuits for animal-related outages.

tasks.description: Create a program to install animal guards on all transformers on the identified circuits.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of all asset locations for the program.

tasks.description: Create and dispatch the work orders to field crews to perform the installations.
tasks.expected_outcome: System creates a batch of work orders for the mitigation program.
